SELECT a.id, a.user_code userCode, a.pwd_num_enc pwdNumEnc, a.user_name userName, a.user_photo userPhoto, a.user_idcard userIdCard, a.user_sex sexName, a.user_lock userLock, (SELECT c.user_name FROM sys_eve_user c WHERE a.creater = c.id) createName, (SELECT group_concat(distinct b.role_name) FROM sys_eve_role b WHERE INSTR(CONCAT(',', a.role_id, ','), CONCAT(',', b.id, ','))) roleName, CONVERT(a.create_time, char) createTime FROM sys_eve_user a WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.user_code like '%${userCode}%'
AND a.user_name like '%${userName}%'
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
SELECT a.id, a.user_lock userLock FROM sys_eve_user a WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT a.id, a.user_code userCode, a.pwd_num_enc pwdNumEnc, a.user_name userName, a.user_photo userPhoto, a.user_idcard userIdCard, a.user_sex userSex FROM sys_eve_user a WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE sys_eve_user
user_name = #{userName}, user_idcard = #{userIdCard}, user_sex = #{userSex},
user_photo = #{userPhoto},
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.user_code userCode, a.pwd_num_enc pwdNum, a.`password`, a.user_lock userLock, b.win_bg_pic_url winBgPicUrl, b.win_lock_bg_pic_url winLockBgPicUrl, b.win_theme_color winThemeColor, b.win_start_menu_size winStartMenuSize, b.win_task_position winTaskPosition FROM sys_eve_user a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_install b ON a.id = b.user_id WHERE a.user_code = #{userCode}
SELECT a.id, a.role_name roleName, a.role_desc roleDesc FROM sys_eve_role a
SELECT IFNULL(a.role_id, "") roleIds FROM sys_eve_user a WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT c.id, c.menu_name `name`, c.title_name title, c.menu_icon icon, c.menu_url pageURL, c.open_type openType, '-1' maxOpen, 'false' extend, null childs, c.menu_parent_id parentId, c.menu_level menuLevel FROM sys_eve_user a, sys_eve_role_menu b, sys_eve_menu c WHERE a.id = #{id} AND INSTR(CONCAT(',', a.role_id, ','), CONCAT(',', b.role_id, ',')) AND b.menu_id = c.id AND c.menu_sys_type = '1' GROUP BY c.id ORDER BY c.order_num ASC

SELECT c.id, c.menu_name `name`, c.title_name title, c.menu_icon icon, c.menu_url pageURL, c.open_type openType, '-1' maxOpen, 'false' extend, null childs, c.menu_parent_id parentId, c.menu_level menuLevel FROM sys_eve_user a, sys_eve_role_menu b, sys_eve_menu c WHERE a.id = #{id} AND INSTR(CONCAT(',', a.role_id, ','), CONCAT(',', b.role_id, ',')) AND b.menu_id = c.id GROUP BY c.id ORDER BY c.order_num ASC
SELECT a.id, a.user_code userCode FROM sys_eve_user a WHERE a.user_code = #{userCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT into sys_eve_user (id, user_code, pwd_num_enc, password, user_name, user_photo, user_idcard, user_sex, user_lock, creater, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{userCode}, #{pwdNum}, #{password}, #{userName}, #{userPhoto}, #{userIdCard}, #{userSex}, #{userLock}, #{createId}, #{createTime})

INSERT into sys_eve_user_install (id, user_id, win_bg_pic_url, win_lock_bg_pic_url, win_theme_color, win_start_menu_size, win_task_position, create_id, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{winBgPicUrl}, #{winLockBgPicUrl}, #{winThemeColor}, #{winStartMenuSize}, #{winTaskPosition}, #{createId}, #{createTime})
